scripts.test-old: npm run build && npm run test-compiled && npm run clean
scripts.test: mkdir tmp;PROD=true node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text --cache npm run test-dev
scripts.test-project: pwd && npm run license-check && node_modules/.bin/depcheck --ignores 'babel-preset-env,assert,chai,cowlog,require-dir' && npm run standard-fix
scripts.test-all-dev: npm run test-project && npm run test-dev
scripts.build-src: mkdir tmp; rm -rf dist;mkdir dist;mkdir dist/src;node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --presets babel-preset-env --out-dir dist/src
scripts.build-test: mkdir dist/tests; node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js tests --presets babel-preset-env --out-dir dist/tests
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-src && npm run build-test
